Name: Murk
About the game: Your goal is to escape from this strange, hostile and really dark place. Don't be afraid of the dark, kill your enemies without mercy, cautiously avoid death traps, discover quirky secret places, and much more! KEY FEATURES: Dark, murky atmosphere. Intense action. Unpredictable vicious enemies. Mysterious hidden locations.
